name: office_template
template: Hi {contact_name}, this is [Your Name] with [Your Company]. I noticed that {company_name} has been operating in the {location} market, and I wanted to discuss an opportunity that could address your {pain_points}. Given the current market conditions, many businesses are looking to {optimize_strategy} their office space. Would you be open to a brief conversation about how we could help optimize your commercial real estate portfolio?
